metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18521 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Divide-by-zero vulnerabilities in the function arlib_add_symbols() in arlib.c in elfutils 0.174 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by eu-ranlib, because a zero sh_entsize is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1').
